title: INVENTORY / LELY TAPE
description: tape now interactable in inventory, if you have the boombox. Lely-Kortenaer banter for interrogate Klaasje sequence

dialogueTree.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: "The porta-reel is just what you nee..."
dialogueTree.text: The porta-reel is just what you needed -- the reels attach to the apparatus with a satisfying click. The tape is routed behind the magnetic reader.

links.title: You: "Play the tape."
links.text: Play the tape.

links.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: "You push 'Commencer' and the tape s..."
links.text: You push 'Commencer' and the tape starts spinning. Violent static and machine sounds fill the air....

links.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: ""...this isn't Revachol," a man's v..."
links.text: "...this isn't Revachol," a man's voice says. "This is a fucking village, I can almost see the elephants." Another loud screech. Some kind of machinery.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The harbour." The lieutenant takes..."
links.text: "The harbour." The lieutenant takes out his notebook. "That's the sound of a Kvalsund crane."

links.title: Interfacing: "He's right."
links.text: He's right.

links.title: Interfacing: "The Kvalsund crane in the harbour...."
links.text: The Kvalsund crane in the harbour. Its screaming is distinctly apocalyptic.

links.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: "More static. "When this shit is don..."
links.text: More static. "When this shit is done I'm gonna tear that place up, Soldier of the Apocalypse style -- kill shit, dogs and chickens too..."

links.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: ""Gonna rent a room, Korty, a real n..."
links.text: "Gonna rent a room, Korty, a real nice one..." This part is unintelligible. "I don't give a shit, I'm fucking done. I'm done mentally."

links.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: ""I'll fucking do them all in, rape..."
links.text: "I'll fucking do them all in, rape that disco cunt on the counter. You know, the dancer whore upstairs. Do it Co Hoi-style."

links.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: ""Never did get that taste out of my..."
links.text: "Never did get that taste out of my mouth..." A click -- then silence. The rest of the tape is empty.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant presses the button m..."
links.text: The lieutenant presses the button marked 'ArrÃªter' on your porta-reel; the tape stops spinning.

links.title: You: ""What was that at the very end? Sil..."
links.text: "What was that at the very end? Silence?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""End of recording.""
links.text: "End of recording."

links.title: You: ""What do you think?""
links.text: "What do you think?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It seemed authentic enough. Probab..."
links.text: "It seemed authentic enough. Probably recorded off their shortwave, then *edited* to seem more incriminating. He sounded like he was on patrol around the harbour walls."

links.title: You: ""I agree. He also sounded inebriate..."
links.text: "I agree. He also sounded inebriated."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Still..." The lieutenant looks at..."
links.text: "Still..." The lieutenant looks at the tape. You are familiar with this look now -- it's his *look of suspicion*.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "There's more going on here than we..."
links.text: There's more going on here than we know.

links.title: You: ""But he *did* say he's going to do..."
links.text: "But he *did* say he's going to do it. You can't edit words into someone's mouth."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Indeed, but..." The lieutenant loo..."
links.text: "Indeed, but..." The lieutenant looks at the tape. You are familiar with this look now -- it's his *look of suspicion*.

links.title: You: ""I think he sounded all right. Just..."
links.text: "I think he sounded all right. Just letting off some steam."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes," he says incredulously. "It w..."
links.text: "Yes," he says incredulously. "It was just *locker room talk*." The lieutenant looks at the tape. You are familiar with this look now -- it's his *look of suspicion*.

links.title: You: ""Who's this *Korty*?""
links.text: "Who's this *Korty*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Korty could be short for 'Kortenae..."
links.text: "Korty could be short for 'Kortenaer'. One of the other mercenaries, the one he was talking to. The third one must be relaying the signal."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One of the other mercenaries I thi..."
links.text: "One of the other mercenaries I think. The one he was talking to. A friend of his?"

links.title: Half Light: "Bad news."
links.text: Bad news.

links.title: You: ""What's Co Hoi?""
links.text: "What's Co Hoi?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A village on the Samaran isola, in..."
links.text: "A village on the Samaran isola, in South Safre. Graad committed war crimes there -- the kind of thing he talks about."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The South Safre conflict is an ongo..."
links.text: The South Safre conflict is an ongoing proxy war between Graad and Safre. It has been hot for 12 years with the atrocities piling on. Mostly committed by the Graad.

links.title: You: ""You think he was there?"
links.text: "You think he was there?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. The tattoos did not say so. Th..."
links.text: "No. The tattoos did not say so. They said he served on Semenine. I think Co Hoi is merc talk for atrocity."

links.title: Rhetoric: "A symbol of *Soldier of the Apocaly..."
links.text: A symbol of *Soldier of the Apocalypse*-style conduct in a civil environment.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who knows? Maybe the tattoos would..."
links.text: "Who knows? Maybe the tattoos would have an answer. Or maybe Co Hoi is just merc talk for atrocity. Slaughter."

links.title: You: ""Okay then. What now?" (Remove the..."
links.text: "Okay then. What now?" (Remove the tape.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we've got a few more quest..."
links.text: "I think we've got a few more questions for Klaasje, don't you?" He looks around. "This seems to contradict her testimony. At least to some degree."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Somewhere between the GRIH and Le C..."
links.text: Somewhere between the GRIH and Le Cycle, the good lieutenant steps out of his Kineema. A brisk, chill wind greets him. You get the feeling he should have been here for this. Listen again when he's here.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant is out there somewhe..."
links.text: The lieutenant is out there somewhere. Doing something. You get the feeling he should have been here for this. Listen again when he's here.

links.title: You: "Play the tape."
links.text: Play the tape.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Not so fast. Somewhere between the..."
links.text: Not so fast. Somewhere between the GRIH and Le Cycle, the good lieutenant steps out of his Kineema. A brisk, chill wind greets him. You get the feeling he should be here for this. Listen when he's here.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Not so fast. The lieutenant is out..."
links.text: Not so fast. The lieutenant is out there somewhere. Doing something. You get the feeling he should be here for this. Listen when he's here.

links.title: You: "Take out the tape."
links.text: Take out the tape.

links.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: "As you take out the tape, the boomb..."
links.text: As you take out the tape, the boombox tunes itself back to the cheery radio again, spewing out beats like it's a Friday night.

links.title: Empathy: "The contrast feels chilly -- inappr..."
links.text: The contrast feels chilly -- inappropriate even.

links.title: You: "Don't play the tape. [Put porta-ree..."
links.text: Don't play the tape. [Put porta-reel away.]

dialogueTree.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: "The porta-reel is just what you nee..."
dialogueTree.text: The porta-reel is just what you needed -- the reels attach to the apparatus with a satisfying click. The tape is routed behind the magnetic reader.

dialogueTree.title: The Great Doorgunner Megamix: "You stare at the Great Doorgunner M..."
dialogueTree.text: You stare at the Great Doorgunner Megamix. If only you had a boombox, you would be able to play Titus' tape.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The tape feels ominous... Upon it,..."
links.text: The tape feels ominous... Upon it, the dead speak. Respect the tape!
